title: In SW PA, you could get an NBC local TV     channel, even over the Allegheny mountains, on the radio. It was found on the farthest point on the left of the dial. Why can one not pick up a local tv station on FM radios here in the Wilmington/Brunswick County area? Thanks
text:
Donna,



It was that way here, too, before the switch to DTV. Here's a link
to a story at StarNewsOnline.com that might answer your question:
http://www.starnewsonline.com/article/20080717/ARTICLES/807170338?p=all&tc=pgall
